ygData.subject: Re: compilation errors
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Nikolai, I think this is an issue with the newer versions of cmake. The problem is that the old versions of cmake automatically added the install folder to

Hey Nikolai,

I think this is an issue with the newer versions of cmake.

T=
he problem is that the old versions of cmake automatically added the instal=
l folder to the link libraries, but the new versions do not.  As a result, =
the ../out/ directory isn't on the link directories list and the Hypercube_=
NEAT can't find the libHypercube_NEAT_Base.a.

To make a long story short, =
add ${LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH} to the LINK_DIRECTORIES section of the CMakeList=
s.txt in Hypercube_NEAT, so it looks like this:

LINK_DIRECTORIES(
	${TINYX=
MLDLL_LIB}
	${BOOST_STAGE}
	${WXWIDGETS_DEBUG_LIB}
	${WXWIDGETS_RELEASE_LIB=
}
	${MPI_LIB}
	${PYTHON_LIB}
	${LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH}
	)

That should fix th=
e problem.




--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "Nikolai" <ker_31_toluca@...> w=
rote:
>
> Hi,
